text_126.en: Adds a radiogroup component into your app. A RadioGroup in mobile UI design is a grouping of radio buttons that allows users to select a single option from a set. In Material Design, RadioGroups help organize and present related choices with a consistent appearance, providing an intuitive and visually cohesive way for users to make selections within a mobile application.

text_129.en: Add a radigroup into your app using the `addRadioGroup` method like this:

text_137.en: Pass `required` as option to have atleast one value selected.

text_139.en: Here are the available setters and getter of the RadioGroup Component.

text_197.en: Here are the available methods available to RadioGroup Component.

text_199.en: Call a function when the value of the radio group has changed.

text_203.en: Adds a callback function when an item is click.

text_207.en: Sets the the radiogroup list items.

text_211.en: Sets an item in the radiogroup component.

text_216.en: Updates an item in the list by its corresponding name.

text_221.en: Adds an item in the radio group list.

text_226.en: Removes an item in the radiogroup items list by its index.

text_230.en: Removes an item in the radiogroup items list by its name.

text_234.en: Removes the last item in the radiogroup. This will return the item being removed.

text_237.en: Removes the first item in the radiogroup. This will return the item being removed.

text_240.en: Enable or disable the radiogroup or an item in the radiogroup.

text_245.en: Get the enabled state of an item in the radio group.

text_250.en: Enable or disable a radiogroup item by its name.

text_255.en: Get the enabled state of a radiogroup item by its name.

text_260.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_264.en: Sets the corner radius of the radiogroup container.

text_272.en: Sets the padding of the radio item. See `itemPadding` property for equivalent setter/getter property.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
